newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle trade not tested - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle trade not tested - USDA.

text.p: Trade was inactive in the Panhandle area early Tuesday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers not tested. Feedlots reporting light inquiry from buyers. 49,900 head confirmed for week to date which includes 29,600 formulated cattle to be shipped this week.

The last established price was $64.00 per cwt on Friday. Tuesday's packer bids were $62.00-$63.00, with asking prices $65.00-$66.00. Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink. Confirmed - None
